definition: bird's nest/nickname for Beijing 2008 Olympic stadium
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: China builds the Bird's Nest, while Hong Kong renovates the racecourse.
sentences.chinese: 中國建造鳥巢，香港改造馬場。

sentences.english: Conclusions The bird nest type nursing plays a facilitative role in growth and development of premature infants.
sentences.chinese: 結論鳥巢式護理有利於早產兒的生長髮育。

sentences.english: A week ago, the Bird's Nest had got its opening.
sentences.chinese: 一個星期以前，“鳥巢”體育館開館。

sentences.english: The bird befouled its own nest.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒弄髒了它自己的鳥巢。

sentences.english: The nest of a bird, such as an eagle, built on a cliff or other high place.
sentences.chinese: 猛禽的巢鳥巢，如鷹巢，築於懸崖或其他高處。

sentences.english: Do you see the hundreds of nests in the trees?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有看到圖片裏面那些樹上的鳥巢？

sentences.english: You can plant a tree or build a birdhouse.
sentences.chinese: 你可以種一棵樹或建一個鳥巢。

sentences.english: Instead I have laid eggs in others’ nests and let other birds to do the hatching job.
sentences.chinese: 我總是在別的鳥巢裏下蛋，讓它們替我孵。

sentences.english: Linglong Tower stands in the Olympic center area between the National Stadium and the National Aquatics Center.
sentences.chinese: 玲瓏塔坐落於奧體中心區，在鳥巢和水立方之間。

sentences.english: Wake the birds and cicadas in sweet dream.
sentences.chinese: 催醒了甜夢裏的鳥巢與知了。

sentences.english: Baby cuckoos oust other baby birds from their nests.
sentences.chinese: 幼鳥從鳥巢裏掉下來了，還不會飛。

sentences.english: Package ticket: includes tickets for the Bird Nest and Snow Park.
sentences.chinese: 包含鳥巢參觀門票及雪場入場券。

sentences.english: I would also like to see that the new build nests .
sentences.chinese: 我還要去看那新築起的鳥巢。

sentences.english: Langlang played the piano for Song Zuying on the concert in Beijing Nest Palaestra.
sentences.chinese: 在北京鳥巢音樂會上，郎朗爲宋祖英伴奏鋼琴。

sentences.english: The naming right of the National Stadium —"bird's nest" are for sale.
sentences.chinese: 國家體育場“鳥巢”的冠名權正在出售中。

sentences.english: A boy finds the baby bird and puts him in his nest.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩看到小鳥，把他放回鳥巢裏。

definition: to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Lushan district of Jiujiang city 九江市, Jiangxi/Mt Lushan in Jiujiang, famous as summer holiday spot
